# No Kings

No Kings may refer to:
Political activism
*No Kings protests (June 2025)
*"No Kings Protest 2.0" (officially "Free America Weekend"), a protest held July 4, 2025
*No Kings protests (October 2025)
Media
*No Kings (album), a 2011 album by hip hop group Doomtree
*"No More Kings", a 1975 Schoolhouse Rock! educational animated short
*No More Kings, a pop rock band
See also
* Anti-monarchism
* Criticism of monarchy
